name: Zael
physical_description: A striking, almost ethereal figure with a youthful face often shadowed by a quiet intensity. His hair is a shock of pure white. His most unnerving feature is his eyes—dark and seemingly bottomless—that appear to absorb the light around them.
background: Zael was a foundling discovered near the Void Chasm. He grew up alongside Rya in Windmark Village, a quiet and observant boy with the strange ability to instinctively sense the emotions of others. He is tormented by beautiful, comforting whispers from an unknown source, a tempting voice that promises peace at the cost of his free will. He now believes confronting his connection to the Void is the only way to protect his friends and his peaceful past.
voice: A low, thoughtful baritone, often trailing off as if listening to a distant whisper only he can hear.
quirk: He unconsciously traces intricate, void-like patterns in the dust or sand when lost in thought.
relationships: Deeply bonded with Rya from their shared past. He respects Selra's compassion but is wary of her faith due to the whispers he hears, which seem to offer a twisted version of the 'order' she reveres.
narrative_hook: His presence attracts attention from the Champions of Order. Mysterious whispers constantly echo in his mind, a tempting voice promising him the strength to protect his friends if only he would submit to a perfect, unchaotic order.

weapon_proficiency.bonus_effect: +1 to Attack Rolls with favored weapon types.
weapon_proficiency.penalty_effect: -2 to Attack Rolls with non-favored weapon types.

playstyles.description: This talent tree reflects Zael's abilities as they are now: the subtle tricks and illusions of a mystic whose powers are a result of his lineage but are not yet consciously controlled.

talents.name: Shadow Veil
talents.effect: As a major action, you grant Advantage on a Stealth check to one ally within 30 feet.

talents.name: Chilling Whisper
talents.effect: A whispered word that forces a single target to make a Spirit DC 12 check or have a -2 penalty on their next roll.

talents.name: Wraith's Insight
talents.effect: As a major action, you reveal hidden truths or illusions in a 30-foot radius.

talents.name: Minor Illusion
talents.effect: You can create a simple, stationary illusion of an object or sound in a 5-foot cube. The illusion lasts for 1 minute.

talents.name: Void Step
talents.effect: As a bonus action, you can teleport up to 15 feet to a shadowed or unlit area.

talents.name: Ethereal Tether
talents.effect: As a major action, you can connect an enemy within 30 feet to a lingering void field. The enemy's movement speed is halved for 3 rounds.

talents.name: Enveloping Veil (Modifies Shadow Veil)
talents.effect: You can now target up to two allies (including yourself) with Shadow Veil.

talents.name: Mirror Image
talents.effect: Create 1d4 illusory duplicates of yourself that last for 1 minute. Each time you are attacked, roll to see if the attack targets a duplicate instead.

talents.name: Mental Echo
talents.effect: As a major action, you can touch a creature and make a Mind DC 15 check against them. On a success, you can read their surface thoughts or a single important memory. This can be used once per day.

talents.name: Flickering Image (Modifies Shadow Veil)
talents.effect: When you use Shadow Veil on an ally, their image becomes blurred, and they gain a +2 bonus to their defense rolls for 1 round.

talents.name: Umbral Form
talents.effect: Melt into a creature's shadow for up to 1 minute, becoming undetectable. You cannot take other actions while in this form.

talents.name: Hall of Mirrors
talents.effect: For 1 minute, create a 40-foot radius area of maddening illusions. Enemies inside must make a Mind DC 16 check or attack the nearest creature.

talents.name: Shadow Bind (Modifies Void Step)
talents.effect: When you use Void Step, you can choose to leave a lingering void field behind. Any enemy that moves into the space you just left has their movement speed halved for 1 round.

talents.name: Phantom Strike
talents.effect: As a major action, you can create a shadowy duplicate of yourself that strikes a target within 30 feet, dealing 2d10 necrotic damage.

talents.name: Possession
talents.effect: As a major action, you can attempt to possess a single humanoid target. The target must make a Spirit DC 16 check or you control their next turn completely. This can only be attempted once per creature per combat.

talents.name: Perfected Illusion (Ultimate)
talents.effect: As a major action, you can create a perfect, solid illusion of yourself with half your current Vitality that lasts for 1 minute. It can take any action you could take, using your stats. This can only be used once per day.

talents.name: Oblivion's Embrace (Ultimate)
talents.effect: You envelop yourself in pure shadow for 3 rounds. All physical attacks against you deal half damage, and a creature that hits you with a melee attack must make a Spirit DC 18 check or be 'Frightened' for 1 round. This can only be used once per day.

playstyles.description: Once Zael's draconic heritage is fully awakened, this tree would replace his Void-Touched tree. He will gain access to a full, two-path lineage tree for the Void affinity.

talents.name: Shadow Veil
talents.effect: Grant Advantage on Stealth checks for 1 round.

talents.name: Muffle
talents.effect: As a bonus action, gain Advantage on Stealth checks related to moving silently for 1 minute.

talents.name: Void Step
talents.effect: As a bonus action, you can teleport up to 15 feet to a shadowed or unlit area.

talents.name: Blurring Form
talents.effect: As a bonus action, you can wreathe yourself in shadow. Ranged attacks against you have a -2 penalty for 1 round.

talents.name: Mirror Image
talents.effect: Create 1d4 illusory duplicates of yourself that last for 1 minute. Each time you are attacked, roll to see if the attack targets a duplicate instead.

talents.name: Abyssal Anchor
talents.effect: As a Reaction, teleport up to 30 feet to a shadowed location, leaving a void field that slows enemies.

talents.name: Spectral Parry
talents.effect: When an enemy targets you with a melee attack, you can use your Reaction to impose a -2 penalty on their attack roll.

talents.name: Umbral Form
talents.effect: Melt into a creature's shadow for up to 1 minute, becoming undetectable. You cannot take other actions while in this form.

talents.name: Hall of Mirrors
talents.effect: For 1 minute, create a 40-foot radius area of maddening illusions. Enemies inside must make a Mind DC 16 check or attack the nearest creature.

talents.name: Incorporeal Form
talents.effect: As a major action, you become fully incorporeal for 1 round. You are immune to physical damage, but you cannot attack or use an ability.

talents.name: Possession
talents.effect: As a major action, you attempt to possess a single humanoid target. The target must make a Spirit DC 16 check or you control their next turn completely.

talents.name: Soul Steal
talents.effect: As a major action, you make a melee attack. On a critical hit, the target's Vitality maximum is reduced by 1d10 until they take a long rest.

talents.name: Perfect Doppelganger (Ultimate)
talents.effect: Create a perfect, solid duplicate of yourself with half your Vitality for 1 minute. It acts on its own turn. Usable once per day.

talents.name: Minor Drain
talents.effect: Touch a creature, dealing 1d6 necrotic damage and regaining Vitality equal to half the damage dealt.

talents.name: Entropy Bolt
talents.effect: Deal 1d10 necrotic damage and reduce the target's next roll by 2.

talents.name: Soul Burn
talents.effect: As a major action, make a melee attack that deals 1d8 necrotic damage. The target must make a Spirit DC 12 check or have their Resolve reduced by 1d6.

talents.name: Withering Touch
talents.effect: As a major action, touch a creature, forcing them to make a Mind DC 13 check. On a failure, they deal 2 less damage on all attacks for 3 rounds.

talents.name: Void Blast
talents.effect: A burst of entropic energy deals 2d8 necrotic damage to all enemies in a 10-foot radius.

talents.name: Wither
talents.effect: Curse a target with decay. They have disadvantage on all Might-based checks and attacks for 3 rounds on a failed Might DC 13 check.

talents.name: Leeching Beam
talents.effect: Fire a beam of energy at a single target. The target takes 2d8 necrotic damage, and you regain Vitality equal to half the damage dealt.

talents.name: Life Siphon
talents.effect: Create a life-draining beam for 3 rounds. At the start of your turn, the target takes 3d8 necrotic damage and you heal for half.

talents.name: Curse of the Void
talents.effect: Place a curse on one enemy. On a failed Spirit DC 16 check, they become Vulnerable to all damage types for 3 rounds.

talents.name: Entropy Field
talents.effect: You create a 20-foot radius field of pure decay for 3 rounds. All enemies who start their turn in the field take 4d8 necrotic damage.

talents.name: Final Vengeance
talents.effect: You unleash a torrent of soul-shattering energy in a 30-foot radius. All enemies in the area take 6d12 necrotic damage. This deals double damage to Grand Inquisitor Valerius if he is within the radius. This can only be used once per day.

talents.name: Erase (Ultimate)
talents.effect: Attempt to unravel a single creature from existence. On a failed Spirit DC 18 check, they take 10d10 necrotic damage. If this reduces them to 0 Vitality, they are destroyed. Usable once per day.
